title: Profile cache structure does not match Go implementation
description: Problem: Go uses nested map cache[Profile]map[color.Color]color.Color initialized only for ANSI256 and ANSI profiles. Crystal uses flat Hash(Tuple(Profile, Ansi::PaletteColor), Ansi::PaletteColor). Impact: Colors may be cached incorrectly, memory inefficiency, behavioral differences. Required: Change to nested hash, initialize only for ANSI256/ANSI, update convert method.
